ygData.msgSnippet: ... Rust glances at the remains of the Ark, assuming a military stance. That answer should be obvious, soldier! he bellows, PATROLL THE PERIMITER!!! Rust

::Rust::

Rust glances at the remains of the Ark, assuming a military 
stance. "That answer should be obvious, soldier!" he 
bellows, "PATROLL THE PERIMITER!!!"

Rust starts marching, walking in a circle around the Ark.


--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, Rudra656@a... wrote:
> ::Whistler::
>     "Okay."  He transforms into his beast mode, that of an elegant 
white 
> weasel.  His tail was bent at the end as it was formed by his 
damaged foot.  
> But at least he could move now.  "Where should we go?"
